es.uned.dia.interoperate.matlab.jimc
Class RMatlabExternalApp

java.lang.Object
  es.uned.dia.interoperate.matlab.jimc.RMatlabExternalApp
All Implemented Interfaces:
ExternalApp
Direct Known Subclasses:
RSimulinkExternalApp
public class RMatlabExternalApp
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExternalApp

Class to implement the communication protocol with a remote MATLAB

Author:
Gonzalo Farias, Francisco Esquembre

step

public void step(double dt)
Steps the application a given step or a number of times. If getCommand() is non-null the command is executed that number of times. If getCommand() is null, the dt parameter is passed down to the externall application, and the actual meaning of this parameter dt will depend on the implementing class

Specified by:
step in interface ExternalApp
Parameters:
dt - double
